name: Coding
description: Learn how to build your very own website!

buttons.text: An Introduction to what code is, what it can be used for and why it's an important skill for the future
Dive into the world of robotics and learn the science behind what makes some of the worlds most powerful robots
Dive into the world of robotics and learn the science behind what makes some of the worlds most powerful robots
You've used them hundreds of time, now it's time to learn how websites are built!
Ever played a video game and wondered exactly what is going on behind the screen? well now you can!
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Uber! if you've used these, then you've already got an idea of what app dev is!

name: 2D Design
description: Artificial intelligence is shaping the future! don't fall behind!

buttons.text: The perfect place to start for people with little to no knowledge on 2D design
What better place to start than animation? one of the most fun topics of 2D and something that everyone can enjoy
Ready to start your own designs? let's get familiar with the software first!
Think you understand 2D Design? Think again! learn about the principles here!

name: 3D Design
description: Ever wanted to program your own robot? you can learn how to, here!

buttons.text: What is 3D design? what can we do with it? find out here with our great introduction!
Learn about one of the fastest growing industies in computing, the magic of 3D animation!
A subject that is still new but has come so far in recent years, how useful will this be in the future?
Ready to start building your own designs? you'll need to get familiar with the software first!
Still interested in 3D? why not see what careers you could pursue in the future!

questions.question: Which of these is not 3D modelling software
What is typically the final process of 3d modelling?
which subject is closely related to 3d modelling?

name: Animation
description: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and Uber and just a few of the 1000's of Apps on the market today, there's a reason they're so popular, find out here

buttons.text: There's a whole world of animation, we think this is a good place to start
There's a whole world of animation, we think this is a good place to start
Ready to Manipulate some animation? Lets start here!

name: Introduction to Coding
description: Welcome to your Introduction to Coding!

questions.question: Which of these is a real programming language?
What of these is the staple of web development

content.text: Coding is all around us! Itâ€™s the way we interact with technology, and the results are everywhere to see!
Nowadays, almost everything that is powered by electricity uses code.
Personal items like: Smart Phones Smart Watches Smart Speakers
Things around the home like: Microwaves Fridges Washing machines
Even big things like: Cars Trains Planes ...and rockets!
When you watch your favourite box set on your TV streaming service,
Send a tweet, email or message
When you play on your latest games console.
Or even warm up your dinner in the microwave.
It happens because of lines of code.
They all rely on code to make them work.

content2.text: Code is a precise set of instructions explaining exactly what you want the computer to do at any given moment.
Computers need to know exactly how to react to things, whether clicking a button or tapping the screen.
Itâ€™s like giving directions to someone on how to get somewhere.
You donâ€™t only need to give the directions, you also have to give solutions for other elements that need to be considered.
For example, what if there is a traffic jam? Or what if your car breaks down?
You need to tell the computer what to do in these circumstances and how to behave.

bannerTwo.text: What kind of languages are there?

text3.text: Apps for Mac, Windows and Linux

name: Robotics
description: Welcome to your Introduction to Robotics!

buttons.text: One of robotics primary uses, learn how large industries utilise robotics

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Welcome to your Introduction to AI!

buttons.text: One of the most widely used aspects of AI, learn how speech recogntion works!

name: Web Development
description: Welcome to your Introduction to Web!

buttons.text: Want to build a website, but not sure how to code? This is the right topic for you!
Learn the basics of Vanilla programming and code your first site with HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript
For people who want a website but don't want to do any of the work!

name: Game Development
description: Welcome to your Introduction to Game Development!

buttons.text: Start from scratch! Literally! start learning problem solving skills to become a better programmer
Nowadays, almost everything that is powered by electricity uses code.
Learn how to build a great interface for your target audience!
Learn the basics of programming so you can build your very first game!
